text: If you want to build and modernize your
applications in the cloud,
you need strong identity and
access management with centralized governance.
AWS enables you to scale and innovate with
the comprehensive identity management,
access control, and visibility needed to grow
and adapt in our ever-changing world.
Use AWS Identity and Access Management,
or IAM, to manage identities in an AWS account
or create temporary credentials for workloads.
Give your workforce access to multiple AWS accounts
and applications with IAM Identity Center.
Centrally managing access all from one place,
you can apply and scale fine-grained permissions so
that youâ€™re granting the right access to the right people
at the right time.
With IAM and AWS Organizations, you can
implement organization-wide, preventative guardrails,
keeping your business safe and supporting fast innovation.
Obtain powerful access analysis capabilities and get the
information you need for better and more
comprehensive access oversight.
Stay on top of protecting your business
by setting, verifying, and right-sizing permissions to
achieve least privilege as your requirements evolve and change.
Innovate confidently and secure your business with IAM today.
